Reviews.Title: Great on a budget!
Reviews.Author: Wesley Buttram
Reviews.Content: For under $100.00 at big name stores this is a good buy. I bought one for my wife at Christmas time and liked it so much I bought one for myself a couple of weeks later. I showed it to a friend of mine and he bought one too. The screen definition is pretty good. App opening and response time is fast enough - no lag on anything. If your expecting a Nexus 7 that costs $250...well your not going to get that. But for under $100 this is a great tablet and can hold it's own in benchmark comparison tests (it's not high on the list of top performers...but hey...it only falls @ 30 seconds or so behind. My conclusion...if your looking for a cheap tablet this is one of the best and I recommend buying one. Also..we tried to buy one at any electronics store just after Christmas and they were all sold out and all pre-orders were already purchased so we had to order one on line and have it shipped to our house as the only option.

Reviews.Title: A terrible product
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: The first day I had this tablet, it had trouble charging and I had to position the cord just so, so that it would charge.  I thought it had a short in the cord so the next day I tried a lot of other cords in my house that fit, but none of them would charge it.  It also had a terrible life span and memory.  This is a terrible product and I wouldn't recommend this to anyone.  It will make you very sad, especially if you had been sitting at your window all day waiting for it to get there.
